name: Starcaller's Watch
title: Offering Unto Wind and Sun: Starcaller's Watch
desc: "I shall watch over you always, O hero solely mine, bound to your shoulder always, like a silken string..."\n"Until our souls are entwined eternally in profoundest peace, where even death shall not do us part."
in_play_description:
The first time each round you play a card whose name was not in your initial deck: That card costs 1 fewer Elemental Die. The attached character deals +1 DMG the next time they deal DMG. (Can stack up to 2 stacks)
(Only Catalyst Characters can equip this. A character can equip a maximum of 1 Weapon)
